ygData.subject: How to download HTML files from a relative path
ygData.msgSnippet: How can I download HTML files only from this path for example http://www.SITENAME/MEMBERNAME(s)/TAG(S)/ I used regexp http://www.SITENAME/.*/TAG(S)/ With
